item.title: Lumberjack Turtle - THM
item.description: Lumberjack Turtle is a medium difficulty box from Tryhackme which is entirely focused on Log4j/Log4shell a 0-day vulnerability that caused a havoc on the internet . The website is vulnerable to Log4j & so we’re able to exploit it and get a shell on the box . We find a .dockerenv file in the / directory which indicates we are on a docker container. To obtain the root flag , we mount the /dev/xvda1 disk partition since it contains the entire filesystem(/) to access all the files .
